DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server v9; © 2004 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualiza la información existente en D_PROVISION. */ UPDATE D_PROVISION SET de_provision = W_T704_DESC FROM AS400.HOST03.SMPDATD.T704FTPRO A INNER JOIN D_PROVISION P ON (A.W_T704_TPRO=P.id_provision) where W_T704_DESC COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP850_CI_AI<>de_provision
/* Inserta la información faltante en D_PROVISION. */ INSERT INTO D_PROVISION (id_provision, de_provision) SELECT W_T704_TPRO as id_provision, W_T704_DESC as de_provision from AS400.HOST03.SMPDATD.T704FTPRO WHERE W_T704_TPRO not in (SELECT id_provision FROM D_PROVISION)
